function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient mitigation progress in building practices","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to contagious diseases due to poorly designed and constructed buildings","Mitigation":"Implement proper building practices and design to mitigate the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Advanced building materials and architectural designs that promote health and hygiene","People":"Those residing or working in poorly designed and constructed buildings","Owner":"Architects, builders, and building owners"},{"Description":"Dependence on day-to-day actions for adaptation to climate change","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to inadequate community engagement and poor health practices","Mitigation":"Promote community engagement and education on health practices to reduce the risk of disease transmission","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, public health education programs","People":"Community members and stakeholders influenced by the climate crisis","Owner":"Community leaders, health organizations, and local government"},{"Description":"Lack of a holistic approach in regenerative development and design","Impact":"Inability to address the interconnected factors that contribute to disease transmission and environmental impacts","Mitigation":"Adopt a holistic approach that considers environmental, social, and health factors in building design and development","Technologies":"Integrated design software, sustainability assessment tools","People":"Building design professionals, community members, and stakeholders","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and environmental organizations"}]}
